My three plots:

1.  time series of concentration of nitrogen and carbon vs depth (dual axis plot)

```{r}
coeff <- 10
nutrient_clean %>% 
  filter(depth <= 80) %>% 
  ggplot()+
  geom_line(aes(x = depth, y = dissolved_n))+
  scale_x_reverse()+
  geom_line(aes(x = depth, y = dissolved_c/coeff))+
  coord_flip()+
  scale_y_continuous(
                     sec_axis = 'Dissolved Carbon')


nutrient_clean_2 <- nutrient_clean %>% 
  filter(depth <= 80)
ggplot(nutrient_clean_2, aes(x = depth))+
  geom_line(aes(y = dissolved_n), color = 'brown')+
  geom_line(aes(y = dissolved_c/coeff), color = 'yellow')+
  scale_y_continuous(name = 'Dissolved Nitrogen',
                     sec.axis = sec_axis(~.*coeff, name = 'Dissolved Carbon'))+
  scale_x_reverse()+
  coord_fixed()+
  coord_flip()
```

```{r}
nutrient_clean %>% 
  ggplot()+
  geom_point(aes(y = depth, x = chlorophyll), color = '#8A9A5B', alpha = 0.75)+
  scale_y_reverse()
```
